I think that we should say to the users that we accept any format read by nibabel. The, in a (wiki) developper page, precise that any type derived from SpatialImage is accepted. We could also enlarge that to any type compatible with spatialimage (get_data, get_affine, get_header, to_filename...).

> I think that we should say to the users that we accept any format read by
> nibabel.

Just say 'formats read by nibabel' without 'any'. That way it is vague.
In a footnote be more precise.
Since we don't really know if we accept all formats, I suggest that we stick to Nifti1Image for the moment. See #579 for further developments.
